titles: Animadversions on two pamphlets lately publish'd by Mr. Collier the one call'd, A defence of the absolution given to Sir William Parkins at the place of execution, April 3d, the other, A vindication thereof, occasion'd by a paper entituled, A declaration of the sense of the achbishops [sic] and bishops, &c. : shewing the nature of the late absolution, both as to church and state : in a letter to a friend.
author: Hody, Humphrey, 1659-1707.
notes: Attributed to Humphrey Hody. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Collier, Jeremy, 1650-1726. --  Defence of the absolution given to Sr. William Perkins, at the place of execution, April the 3d.
Williams, John, 1636?-1709. --  Declaration of the sense of the archbishops and bishops.
